name: A flying fly
description:
Description

You're a fly collecting coins inside an underground spider nest, the floor is full of spiders and spiderwebs. Why are you there? Who knows...

- * - * - * - * - * - * - * - * - * - * - * - * - * - * - * - * - * - * - * - * - * - * 

Controls

KeyActionA Go to the left D Go to the right Space Fly upS Fall faster

- * - * - * - * - * - * - * - * - * - * - * - * - * - * - * - * - * - * - * - * - * - * 

Credits

  • Godot logo: "Godot logo monochrome", from godotengine.org/press. Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International.
  • Spider texture:  "Platformer Art: Extended Enemies" by Kenney. Licensed under CC0 1.0 Universal.
  • Fly texture:  "Platformer Art: Extended Enemies" by Kenney. Licensed under CC0 1.0 Universal.
  • Coin texture:  "Platformer Art Deluxe" by Kenney. Licensed under CC0 1.0 Universal.
  • Background textures:  "Abstract Platformer" by Kenney. Licensed under CC0 1.0 Universal.
  • Floor texture and Spiderwebs: made by me.
  • Font: "Kenney Pixel" by Kenney. Licensed under CC0 1.0 Universal.
  • Music: “Flying Dreams”, from PlayOnLoop.com. Licensed under Creative Commons by Attribution 4.0

- * - * - * - * - * - * - * - * - * - * - * - * - * - * - * - * - * - * - * - * - * - * 

Final words

Probably there are some tiny bugs ( ;D ) I didn't catch in this short time or probably I made a typo on some text because english isn't my first language.

It's pretty hard to make a game in just 72hs as a solo dev, I "wasted" a lot of time trying to make some textures by myself and my original idea was to create all the textures in the game, add more levels, more mechanics and more enemies. Sadly I'm still learning and I didn't have enough time but anyway I'm proud of what I created.
